actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of a report issued by the Committee on Foreign Affairs.

summary.text: Provides that there shall be printed for use by the Committee on Foreign Affairs of the House of Representatives 1,000 copies of the report of the Subcommittee on International Organizations and Movements of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, House of Representatives, entitled "Human Rights in the World Community: A Call for U.S. Leadership".

titles.title: Concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of a report issued by the Committee on Foreign Affairs.
